s_synopsis: Bomber Man has arrived to restore peace on the planet, which has been split into five parts by an evil hand! In addition to the nine members of the Bomber Family, the character Rooi shows up to lend a hand. Jump on the eggs that appear from destroyed soft blocks, and you can ride one of five types of Rooi. Each Rooi has different special abilitiesuse these well and youll ride to victory! Bombs that turn according to arrows and other new gimmicks have been added to battle game, increased to ten stages. Tag-team matches are now possible, ensuring that this game will be a blast!
